Reviews.Title: Bum deal
Reviews.Author: Red2872
Reviews.Content: Dvr doesnt work. Turned on onetime and when it did, it only did motion detect.now nothing. That was the main function I bought this for.

Reviews.Title: Total scam!
Reviews.Author: happy_anon
Reviews.Content: This product was shipped and arrived on time, but it was all scratched up and totally useless. I've read similar reports from others but I had a slight hope that it would not happen to me... I would advise all ppl thinking about buying this item to stay well clear!!! It is worthless! :(

Reviews.Title: Poor instructions
Reviews.Author: Momshopper
Reviews.Content: The directions are not clear enough to understand how to make it work.  I cannot give a good or bad review d/t not knowing if it actually functions.  I bought this d/t the youtube video I watched prior to purchase.
